abstract: Lufthansa, one of the largest airlines in Europe, submitted a revised proposal to the European Commission for its takeover of Austrian Airlines, a spokeswoman for the carrier said, even as it asked Austrian regulators to defer a deadline for the deal by a month.
snippet: Lufthansa, one of the largest airlines in Europe, submitted a revised proposal to the European Commission for its takeover of Austrian Airlines, a spokeswoman for the carrier said, even as it asked Austrian regulators to defer a deadline for the d...
lead_paragraph: Lufthansa, one of the largest airlines in Europe, submitted a revised proposal to the European Commission for its takeover of Austrian Airlines, a spokeswoman for the German airline said on Tuesday, even as it asked Austrian regulators to defer a deadline for the deal by a month, until Aug. 31.

headline.main: Revising Plan, Lufthansa Asks to Defer Takeover Deadline
